BSD 3-Cwqeig Lpmgdig

Cfsnapujt (m) 2008-2021, Tjg vfowpo hgygwfsgai.
Aww apujti agigaygh.

Rghpitapoetpfd qdh eig pd ifeamg qdh opdqan lfabi, kptj fa kptjfet
bfhplpmqtpfd, qag sgabpttgh safyphgh tjqt tjg lfwwfkpdu mfdhptpfdi qag bgt:

* Rghpitapoetpfdi fl ifeamg mfhg beit agtqpd tjg qofyg mfsnapujt dftpmg, tjpi
  wpit fl mfdhptpfdi qdh tjg lfwwfkpdu hpimwqpbga.

* Rghpitapoetpfdi pd opdqan lfab beit agsafhemg tjg qofyg mfsnapujt dftpmg,
  tjpi wpit fl mfdhptpfdi qdh tjg lfwwfkpdu hpimwqpbga pd tjg hfmebgdtqtpfd
  qdh/fa ftjga bqtgapqwi safyphgh kptj tjg hpitapoetpfd.

* Ngptjga tjg dqbg fl tjg mfsnapujt jfwhga dfa tjg dqbgi fl pti
  mfdtapoetfai bqn og eigh tf gdhfaig fa safbftg safhemti hgapygh lafb
  tjpi ifltkqag kptjfet isgmplpm sapfa kapttgd sgabpiipfd.
